content: stuff this amigurumi cornucopia with your favorite thanksgiving treats shown in cocoa additional materials crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers worked in continuous rounds pattern also available in italian translated with permission http //www cosedilia com/cornucopia html 1 items in the thanksgiving cornucopia set cornucopia apple 2 pumpkin 3 corn on the cob 4 squash 5 eggplant 6 1 http //www cosedilia com/cornucopia html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/apple-80839ad 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pumpkin-80840ad 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/corn-on-the-cob-80841ad 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/squash-80842ad 6 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eggplant-80843ad
